      Subclasses of GodCard in it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Model.Cards 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Apollo
      Class Apollo your Builder may move into an opponent Builder's space by forcing their Builder to the space yours just vacated
      class  Ares
      Class Ares you may remove an unoccupied block (not dome) neighboring your unmoved Worker
      class  Artemis
      Class Artemis your Builder may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space
      class  Athena
      Class Athena if one of your Builders moved up on your last turn, opponent Builders cannot move up this turn
      class  Atlas
      Class Atlas your Builder may build a dome at any level
      class  Chronus
      Class Chronus you also win when there are at least five Complete Towers on the board
      class  Demeter
      Class Demeter your Builder may build one additional time, but not on the same space
      class  Hephaestus
      Class Hephaestus your Builder may build one additional block(not dome) on top of your first block
      class  Hestia
      Class Hestia your worker may build on additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space
      class  Minotaur
      Class Minotaur your Builder may move into an opponent Builder's space, if their Builder can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level
      class  Pan
      Class Pan you also win if your Builder moves down two or more levels
      class  Prometheus
      Class Prometheus if your Builder does not move up, it may build both before and after moving
      class  Triton
      Class Triton Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again
      class  Zeus
      Class Zeus your worker may build a block under itself
